step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Duplicate the first layer image.=Duplicate the first layer image.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Effects > Artistic > Pencil.=Tap Effects > Artistic > Pencil.
$$$/Tutorial/Set the threshold to 50%. Tap Apply.=Set the threshold to 50%. Tap Apply.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Layer Properties. Set Blend Mode to Overlay. Tap the image to dismiss dialog box.=Tap Layer Properties. Set Blend Mode to Overlay. Tap the image to dismiss dialog box.
